text.__SUMMARY__: Prunus herthae is a species of plant in the family Rosaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador.
text.Sources: Romoleroux, K. & Pitman, N. (2004). "Prunus herthae". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 2004: e.T45999A11025903. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.2004.RLTS.T45999A11025903.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
